mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_TBL VALUES(SEQ_MOVIE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{movieTitle}, #{movieGenre}, #{movieRuntime}, #{movieDirector}, #{movieActor}, #{movieAge}, #{movieStartday}, #{movieTicketingday}, #{movieEndday}, #{movieContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE MOVIE_TBL SET MOVIE_TITLE = #{movieTitle}, MOVIE_GENRE = #{movieGenre}, MOVIE_RUNTIME = #{movieRuntime}, MOVIE_DIRECTOR = #{movieDirector}, MOVIE_ACTOR = #{movieActor}, MOVIE_AGE = #{movieAge}, MOVIE_STARTDAY = #{movieStartday}, MOVIE_TICKETINGDAY = #{movieTicketingday}, MOVIE_ENDDAY = #{movieEndday}, MOVIE_CONTENT = #{movieContent} WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo}
UPDATE MOVIE_IMG_TBL SET MOVIE_IMG_NAME = #{movieImgName}, MOVIE_IMG_RENAME = #{movieImgRename}, MOVIE_IMG_PATH = #{movieImgPath} WHERE MOVIE_IMG_NO = ${movieImgNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TBL ORDER BY MOVIE_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE TO_CHAR(MOVIE_ENDDAY, 'yyyyMMdd') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchName} || '%'
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo}
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_IMG_TBL WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_IMG_NO
SELECT * FROM MOVIE_VIDEO_TBL WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_VIDEO_NO
SELECT MOVIE_TITLE AS MOVIE_NAME, MOVIE_DAY, MOVIE_START, MOVIE_END FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TIME_TBL WHERE THEATER_NO = #{theaterNo}) MTT JOIN MOVIE_TBL MT ON MTT.MOVIE_NO = MT.MOVIE_NO

SELECT THEATER_NAME AS THEATER_NAME, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_DAY, MOVIE_START, MOVIE_END, MOVIE_TICKET, MOVIE_SEAT FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TIME_TBL WHERE CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo}) MTT JOIN THEATER_TBL TT ON MTT.THEATER_NO = TT.THEATER_NO

SELECT THEATER_NAME AS THEATER_NAME, MOVIE_NO, MOVIE_DAY, MOVIE_START, MOVIE_END, MOVIE_TICKET, MOVIE_SEAT FROM (SELECT * FROM MOVIE_TIME_TBL WHERE CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND MOVIE_DAY=#{movieDay}) MTT JOIN THEATER_TBL TT ON MTT.THEATER_NO = TT.THEATER_NO

WITH MOVIES AS (SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, A.MOVIE_AGE, A.MOVIE_STARTDAY, A.MOVIE_ENDDAY, A.MOVIE_ZZIM, B.MOVIE_IMG_NAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME) AS C_NUM FROM MOVIE_TBL A JOIN MOVIE_IMG_TBL B ON A.MOVIE_NO = B.MOVIE_NO) SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE C_NUM = 1 AND MOVIE_ENDDAY > SYSDATE AND MOVIE_STARTDAY <= SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_ENDDAY > SYSDATE AND MOVIE_STARTDAY <= SYSDATE

WITH MOVIES AS (SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, A.MOVIE_AGE, A.MOVIE_STARTDAY, A.MOVIE_ENDDAY, A.MOVIE_ZZIM, B.MOVIE_IMG_NAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME) AS C_NUM FROM MOVIE_TBL A JOIN MOVIE_IMG_TBL B ON A.MOVIE_NO = B.MOVIE_NO) SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE C_NUM = 1 AND MOVIE_ENDDAY >= SYSDATE AND MOVIE_STARTDAY >= SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_ENDDAY >= SYSDATE AND MOVIE_STARTDAY >= SYSDATE

WITH MOVIES AS (SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, A.MOVIE_AGE, A.MOVIE_STARTDAY, A.MOVIE_ENDDAY, A.MOVIE_ZZIM, B.MOVIE_IMG_NAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME) AS C_NUM FROM MOVIE_TBL A JOIN MOVIE_IMG_TBL B ON A.MOVIE_NO = B.MOVIE_NO) SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE C_NUM = 1 AND MOVIE_ENDDAY <= SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_TBL WHERE MOVIE_ENDDAY <= SYSDATE

WITH MOVIES AS (SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, A.MOVIE_AGE, A.MOVIE_STARTDAY, A.MOVIE_ENDDAY, B.MOVIE_IMG_NAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME) AS C_NUM FROM MOVIE_TBL A JOIN MOVIE_IMG_TBL B ON A.MOVIE_NO = B.MOVIE_NO) SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE C_NUM = 1

WITH MOVIES AS (SELECT A.MOVIE_NO, A.MOVIE_TITLE, A.MOVIE_ACTOR, A.MOVIE_AGE, A.MOVIE_STARTDAY, A.MOVIE_ENDDAY, B.MOVIE_IMG_NAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME, B.MOVIE_IMG_PATH, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.MOVIE_NO ORDER BY B.MOVIE_IMG_RENAME) AS C_NUM FROM MOVIE_TBL A JOIN MOVIE_IMG_TBL B ON A.MOVIE_NO = B.MOVIE_NO) SELECT * FROM MOVIES WHERE C_NUM = 1 AND MOVIE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

SELECT DISTINCT MT.MOVIE_NO, MT.MOVIE_TITLE, MT.MOVIE_ENDDAY FROM MOVIE_TBL MT, MOVIE_TIME_TBL MTT WHERE MTT.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} AND MTT.MOVIE_DAY = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND MT.MOVIE_NO = MTT.MOVIE_NO

SELECT MT.MOVIE_NO, TT.THEATER_NO, MT.MOVIE_TITLE, MT.MOVIE_AGE, TT.THEATER_NAME, MTT.MOVIE_NO, MTT.MOVIE_DAY, MTT.MOVIE_START, MTT.MOVIE_END, MTT.MOVIE_TICKET, MTT.MOVIE_SEAT FROM MOVIE_TBL MT, THEATER_TBL TT, MOVIE_TIME_TBL MTT WHERE MT.MOVIE_NO = MTT.MOVIE_NO AND TT.THEATER_NO = MTT.THEATER_NO AND MTT.MOVIE_DAY = #{movieDay} AND MTT.CINEMA_NO = #{cinemaNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_START
